attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Non-academic kids with a clear interest in a trade are badly served by schools and disrupt the education of others as they mark time. Give them the chance to learn a craft or trade after Year 9 through apprentice schemes. Allow them to feel a sense of purpose and build a future. Support these schemes and give frustrated kids a positive goal in life. A chance for the Prime Minister to leave a cherished legacy.
